body.p: The Centralized Logging feature is automatically installed as part of Helion installation. The base logging levels will be set during installation according to the amount of RAM allocated to your control plane nodes to ensure optimum performance.

No specific configuration is required to use Centralized Logging. However, you can configure the individual components as needed for your environment. This topic provides information on how to configure the following settings:
